attributes.action: Demand full publication of the report by European Union Auditors into alleged misuse of expenses by MEP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The european Parliament voted (22nd April 2008) to keep confindential a report by European Auditors into misuse of funds by MEP's. This included allegations of payments for work not done, ficticious employees and other alleged fraudulant activities
